summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 28th Avenue, from East Alder Street to East Spruce Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 101042 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
